page.title: 06 Footpaths in Polstead
page.content: A footpaths working party has been set up in the last three years and meets when necessary to clear footpaths and waymark disputed paths.A new definitive map ,drawn by a local "newcomer"is awaiting publication,but may be viewed outside the village hall,or purchased at the Post office.There are still some footpaths that run through land recently used for building and the new owners will not accept that the footpaths still exist.An elderly resident comments that most footpaths are now signposted except the main one,the path from what used to be the shop leading past the Red Barn and out at Spring Hill.This used to be a favourite family walk and one could always meet four or five families along this path.The paths have such names as Cherry Billy's Lane and Philly Hick's Lane and are still numerous.
